txt.en: 'The sheep are all set, and the next step is the chickens. The children don't so much get to pet those but they do enjoy throwing feed in and watching them run like crazy to try and get it all.\n\n'The chickens got out in the same storm that the sheep did last week. Unlike the sheep, they won't follow you. You'll have to grab them and carry them back over here. They're squirmy though, so move quick.'
'The little ones love to watch the chickens run around trying to get all the corn they throw in for them.'
'The chickens will try and get away, so move quickly once you've grabbed them.'
One of the main features of the Northcotton Farmer's Market is its animal petting area.
Chickens can be found around the animal pens on Northcotton Farm.\n\nGerard Deephole asked you to gather up the chickens around the farm.
Gerard Deephole is at the animal pens on Northcotton Farm.\n\nGerard Deephole will be pleased to hear the chickens have all been caught.
